column3: 2015 view events & service information share facebook twitter google+ post now light a candle virtual gifts yellow rose periwinkle blue green red dove angel heart hug butterfly roses hands in prayer bible sunshine teddy american flag veteran rosary gardener interlocked rings catholic cross football baseball golf sailboat firefighter non catholic cross basketball police buddha hockey coach soccer star of david canadian flag menorah memories events media share a memory of john e. martinez your friends at asbury medical supply and all saints sent flowers to the family of john e. martinez. to show you care same-day hand delivery by a local florist! ms matthew szaban. jun 11 at 3:20 pm my heart breaks to know you are gone. i do find blessings in your ability to rest and find peace now. you were the first to welcome me into your family
column4: you showed me what a patriarch truly is. you gave me friendship
column5: love and guidance. you gave me what i missed my entire life. i am a better man because of you john and even though i am crying because we will never speak again i am smiling knowing that your strong spirit will continue to guide us all. rest now my friend and know that you were and will be cherished forever. with love always
column6: your friend matthew. comment share comment share facebook twitter
